name: UGBY MUMBA
description:
Originally made in 48 hours for and came in 7th place in the 29th gm(48)!

Help Mumba on his multi-colored quest for glory and honor! This game features 14 unique weapons, 8 levels, 7 shopkeepers, and 48 of hours of sleep deprivation behind it!

CONTROLS

[LEFT]/[RIGHT] - Move/Select

[UP]/[DOWN] - Change equipped gun

[Z] - Jump/Accept

[X] - Shoot/Cancel

[F1] - Toggle fullscreen

CREDITS

Jack/Moo: Lead programmer, tile artist, sound effects

MajorWipeout: Lead musician

Jellyace: Character artist

Gelox: Item artist, background artist

Loudspeaker: Enemy artist

SUPPORT MILKBAR LADS ON PATREON!
